column5: You will get a first overview about the main functionalities of the OTRS ticket system
column6: Basic idea of a ticket systems: roles and groups
column7: You as the Customer</br>- login with a customer user from market</br>- create new request within your market via customer interface</br></br>You as the Agent</br>- login with the corresponding market agent</br>- process and close the tickets.</br></br>Make use of different customer user and agents to check the regional division. Also involve higher support level of market queues!
